metadata.title: CVE-2017-7302 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, has a swap_std_reloc_out function in bfd/aoutx.h that isvulnerable to an invalid read (of size 4) because of missing checks forrelocs that could not be recognised. This vulnerability causes Binutilsutilities like strip to crash.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
